response.overview: Sun Tongtong, a 10-year-old girl whose parents are divorced, temporarily lives with her father and his young girlfriend, Cai Cai while her mother is away on a business trip. Tong Tong experiences the joy of a family of three for the first time, and even develops a wonderful bond with Cai Cai. One day, Cai Cai takes Tong Tong on a date with another man. Tong Tong tries her best to protect the family of three, but she is unexpectedly introduced to a brutal coming-of-age ceremony.
response.title: Don’t Kill My Memory
